sentences.sentence: Data transmission is the base of Telemeter Seismographic Network.
sentences.translation: 数据传输是遥测地震台网的运行基础之一。

sentences.sentence: Photo: Buzz Aldrin has just set up seismographic equipment on the surface of the moon, July 20, 1969.
sentences.translation: 照片：1969年7月20日Buzz Aldrin刚刚在月球表面设置完成测震学仪器。

sentences.sentence: Top photo: Buzz Aldrin has just set up seismographic equipment on the surface of the moon, July 20, 1969.
sentences.translation: 照片：巴兹·奥尔德林刚在月球表面架起测震器材，1969年7月20日。
